TopicTitle: Should I use more than one object in Blender ?

Articles.Content:
I want to make a mod (modification) for Kerbal Space Program.I only saw mods with just one object.Why aren't mod creators  using more than one object ? Can it lag much more if I have more than one object (=more than one texture file)?

Is it possible to make a mod with more than one object in Blender with Unity?

Thank you!

[MOD - Moved to Modelling and Texturing Discussion subforums]

Most part mod authors do in fact use more than one mesh/object in their part files, as this makes it easier to model and UV unwrap for texturing. And many part models can use multiple textures for a single part.
